p2_medium.title: E2E tests cannot run in Replit
p2_medium.actual: Installation fails - Replit doesn't support apt-based dependencies
p2_medium.impact: Cannot run E2E, a11y, or visual tests in Replit environment
p2_medium.workaround: E2E tests must run in GitHub Actions CI/CD

immediate_actions: Debug and fix unit test hanging issue (P0-2)
Fix React hooks violations in 3 components (P1-1, P1-2, P1-3)
next_steps: Set up GitHub Actions for E2E testing (already configured in .github/workflows/quality-gates.yml)
Create individual PRs for each P0/P1 fix with BEFORE/AFTER screenshots
ci_cd_notes: GitHub Actions workflow already created at .github/workflows/quality-gates.yml
Workflow will run typecheck, lint, test, e2e, a11y, snapshots on every PR
E2E tests will work in CI (GitHub provides browsers), just not locally in Replit
